relationships.description: Engaged in casual email exchange about political topics

analysis.summary: This email exchange shows Heather Mann asking Jeffrey E. for his opinion on the 2016 presidential election between Trump and Clinton, with Jeffrey responding that there's 'uncertainty ahead' as the only responsible thing to say about the political situation.
